name: Baldi's Basics in Education and Unused Content
name_original: Baldi's Basics in Education and Unused Content
description: This mod uses unused/placeholder textures that weren't seen in any final builds of the game. This is my first Baldi mod so some things such as the audio aren't perfect yet and I haven't put them in the game yet. I hope you enjoy it. I wonder if someone did this already.
